text: Issi tarah bey ilm logon ney bhi kaha kay khud Allah Taalaa hum say baaten kiyon nahi kerta ya humaray pass koi nishani kiyon nahi aati? Issi tarah aisi hi baat inn kay aglon ney bhi kahi thi unn kay aur inn kay dil yaksan hogaye. Hum ney to yaqeen kerney walon kay liye nishaniyan biyan ker den
